column5: YOU WILL FIND in the DIARIES a LOT of POLITICS AND EVEN MORE CATS     THE PERSON who MAKES the FIRST COMMENT WILL GET TWO CATS EVERY PERSON WHO COMMENTS WILL GET A CAT     RULES IN THE DIARY WHEN YOU FIND SOMETHING in the DIARY that you LIKE YOU CAN REPOST IT AS COMMENT in the DIARY  PRESIDENT JOE BIDEN New on @MSNBC: President Biden says he will travel to Florida as early as Thursday to visit the scene of the Florida building collapse.  PRESIDENT OBAMA President Obama: During the 2020 election Trump violated a "core tenet that we count the votes and then declare a winner" adding that people saw him "fabricate and make up a whole bunch of hooey." https://t.co/JyhWZ2Eit7  SEN. AMY KLOBUCHAR Sen. Amy Klobuchar Chairwoman of the Rules Committee has announced a field hearing on voting rights in Georgia on July 19. This will be the first field hearing held by the Rules Committee in 20 years. Witnesses will testify about the state's new voter restrictions.  GOP REP. GONZALES GOP Rep. Gonzalez who voted to impeach: "I couldn't care less about what the former president says about me. I really couldn't. What I do care about is the fact that he continues to double and triple down on the election lies that led to insurrection." https://t.co/FO9ErV3Ebg  PAUL GOSAR’S SIBLINGS Republican Paul Gosar's siblings say he should've been removed from Congress by now:"I consider him a traitor to this country. I consider him a traitor to his family." https://t.co/kpfNCGvSIK  FOX NEWS Fox has agreed to pay a million-dollar fine for what New York City's Commission on Human Rights calls "a pattern of violating of the NYC Human Rights Law." https://t.co/breF4YiOwM  WNBA WNBA announcement: There have been zero positive COVID tests among players since the start of the season. 99% of the league is now fully vaccinated.  TEXAS More than two dozen progressive groups have united against Texas Republicans' renewed efforts to pass voting restrictions forming a new coalition days before a special session of the state Legislature is scheduled to begin. https://t.co/WDGEKfe0jI  CALIFORNIA California tenants will be protected from evictions for another three months and those with low incomes will have all of their past-due rent paid by the state under a bill signed by Gov. Gavin Newsom in response to the pandemic. https://t.co/ABuBJfB0cE  California will ban state-funded travel to Arkansas Florida Montana North Dakota and West Virginia in response to anti-LGBTQ legislation in those places. https://t.co/GPNOlNJ6lT  VIRGINIA A series of big voting expansions take effect in Virginia on July 1:Bills that permit early voting on Sundays remove witness signature requirements fund pre-paid postage and maintain access to ballot drop boxes all take effect.https://t.co/8qGF2N09Rs  ARIZONA Maricopa County officials have announced that they'll never again use voting machines that were turned over to the 'auditors' hired by Arizona Senate Republicans to conduct a fake audit of the 2020 election.https://t.co/HC8QqDSz25  TRUMP The former daughter-in-law of Trump Org. CFO Allen Weisselberg says she's prepared to testify before the Manhattan DA's grand jury. https://t.co/qoTHrYzhqZ
